description:
In order to prove their alliance to the Council, Yuuya and the other Lancers participate in the Friendship Cup at Reiji`s suggestion. On top of which, Yuuya is ordered to participate in an exhibition match on the eve of the tournament where his opponent is King, Jack Atlas...! The crowd`s fevered excitement engulfs the arena where Yuuya is astonished by the force of Jack`s presence. He tries to hold true to his entertainment Dueling, but...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ターニング・ポイント
